# Imitater

Create a `.env` file in the root directory:

```
.
├── src
└── .env
```

```
# imitater
CHAT_MODEL=path_to_chat_model
EMBED_MODEL=path_to_bge_model
EMBED_BATCH_SIZE=16
ENABLE_ATTN_BIAS=0

# tests
OPENAI_BASE_URL=http://192.168.0.1:8000/v1
OPENAI_API_KEY=0
```

## Launch Server

```bash
python src/launch.py
```

## Test Server

```bash
python tests/test_openai.py
```
